item.title: Mobilize your brand with Brandtone. Irish startup with top notch investors
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A low key startup, Brandtone, founded by some ex-Digicel management, who provide Mobile Marketing services in global markets for the likes of Unilever, Kelloggs and Kimberley-Clark , recently secured funding from Verlinvest, Unilever Ventures and Enterprise Ireland Check out this video of a Campaign for client Unilever in South Africa
item.content:encoded:
A low key startup, Brandtone, founded by some ex-Digicel management, who provide Mobile Marketing services in global markets for the likes of Unilever, Kelloggs and Kimberley-Clark , recently secured funding from Verlinvest, Unilever Ventures and Enterprise Ireland

Check out this video of a Campaign for client Unilever in South Africa
